title: WEN® by Chaz Dean Healthy Hair Care Kit
description: Keep hair looking healthy, hydrated and strong with this one-two punch! Our Cleansing Conditioner is formulated to gently cleanse the hair without stripping it of its natural oils. And our Re Moist Intensive Hair Treatment, a concentrated, deeply restorative formula is designed to help nourish, moisturize and condition stressed-out hair. Cleansing Conditioner, 16 oz., Re Moist Intensive Hair Treatment, 4 oz.  And as a Bonus, we add in the Replenishing Treatment Mist for free!

title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Styling Creme 4 oz
description: Instead of using a gel for hold and a polishing gloss for shine, now you can achieve both with one product: WEN Styling Crme. This creamy, softhold formula is designed to promote moisture, enhance shine and boost body. Even better: hair treated with this protective potion was up to 80% stronger against heat styling stress than untreated hair. *Tested against untreated hair.

title: WEN Cleansing Creme Shower Comb NEW By Chaz Dean
description: Comb by Chaz Dean: Length 7 1/2" maximum Width 2"
